title: Values of first and second after assignments

content.question:
Consider the following code segment.

What are the values of first and second as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: The value of first is true, and the value of second is true.
The value of first is true, and the value of second is false.
The value of first is false, and the value of second is true.
The value of first is false, and the value of second is false.

content.answer: The value of first is true, and the value of second is true.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
